casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ailkeem Anthony NORMAN 153P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 17, 2017 Ben G. Irons, II, Attorney at Law, Greenville, for Norman, Ailkeem Anthony. *55Douglas W. Corkhill, Assistant Attorney General, Seth H. Edwards, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of May 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of May 2017."
